<!-- DO NOT EDIT THIS SECTION. See "Edit below this line" below -->

%LINKCSS%

<script type="text/javascript">
<!--


function makeTopicName(ReportId)
{
    var first = ReportId;
    var second = document.getElementById('reporter' + first).value;
    var third = document.getElementById('period' + first).value;    
    if (third && second && first) {
        var topicName = 'Rpt' + first + second + third;
        document.getElementById('topicForNew' + first).value = topicName;
        document.getElementById('reportForm' + first).submit();
        return true;  
    }
    else {
        alert("Please complete the form.");
        return 0;}
}

function setReportingPerson(ReportingPersonString, RpReportId)
{
    var setRP = ReportingPersonString;
    var setId = RpReportId;
    document.getElementById('reportingPerson' + setId).value = setRP;
    return true;
}    


// -->
</script>


<!-- DO NOT EDIT ABOVE THIS LINE! -->



---++!! Create a New Report
This topic includes forms for creating new Sub-Area and PI Quaterly Reports.



<noautolink>
<!-- the Sub Area report div -->
<!-- div id="SubArDiv" style="float:right; width:60%; border:3px solid rgb(250,0,0); margin-bottom:2em; padding: 1em;" -->
<a name="AreaCoord"></a>


---++ Create new Sub-Area Quarterly Report

<form name="ProjectQuarterlyReport_form" action="%SCRIPTURLPATH{edit}%/%WEB%/" id="reportFormSa">
  <input type="hidden" value="Sub-Area Quarterly" name="ReportType" id="reportTypeSa" />
  <p><span style="text-align: left; font-weight:bold;">Select Sub-Area:</span> 
     <select name="Reporter" id="reporterSa" >
       <option value="" onClick="setReportingPerson('There is nothing selected!', 'Select'); alert('You must select a Sub-Area';">Select...</option>
       <option value="CommAdmin" onClick="setReportingPerson('Admin. and Communication &#40;Ruth Pordes&#41;', 'Sa');">Admin. and Communications (Pordes)</option>  
       <option value="AppCoord" onClick="setReportingPerson('Application, Extensions & Users &#40;Torre Wenaus &amp; Frank Wurthwein&#41;', 'Sa');">Application, Extensions & Users (Wenaus / Wurthwein)</option>
       <option value="Eto" onClick="setReportingPerson('Education, Training, and Outreach &#40;Mike Wilde&#41;', 'Sa');">Education, Training, and Outreach (Wilde)</option>
       <option value="Engage" onClick="setReportingPerson('Engagement &#40;John McGee&#41;', 'Sa');">Engagement (McGee)</option>
       <option value="Facility" onClick="setReportingPerson('Facility &#40;Miron Livny &amp; Todd Tannenbaum&#41;', 'Sa');">Facility (Livny / Tannenbaum)</option>
       <option value="OpsCoor" onClick="setReportingPerson('Operations Coordinator &#40;Rob Quick&#41;', 'Sa');">Operations Coordinator (Quick)</option>
       <option value="ResourceMgr" onClick="setReportingPerson('Resource Managers &#40;Paul Avery &amp; Kent Blackburn&#41;', 'Sa');">Resource Manager (Avery / Blackburn)</option>
       <option value="Security" onClick="setReportingPerson('Security &#40;Don Petravick&#41;', 'Sa');">Security (Petravick)</option>
       <option value="SoftwareCoor" onClick="setReportingPerson('Software Coordinator &#40;Alain Roy&#41;', 'Sa');">Software Coordinator (Roy)</option>
     </select>
     <input type="hidden" value="" name="reportingPerson" id="reportingPersonSa" />
  </p>  
  <p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Period of Report:</span> 
    <select name="period" id="periodSa">
       <option value="">Select...</option>
       <option value="2007Q1">Q1 2007</option>
       <option value="2007Q2">Q2 2007</option>
       <option value="2007Q3">Q3 2007</option>
       <option value="2007Q4">Q4 2007</option>
     </select>
  </p>
  
  <!-- everything else is hidden -->
  <input type="hidden" name="topicparent" value="%TOPIC%" id="topicparentSa" /><!-- sets this topic as the parent for the report topic that we are creating -->
  <input type="hidden" name="onlywikiname" value="on" id="onlywikinameSa" />
  <input type="hidden" name="onlynewtopic" value="on" id="onlynewtopicSa" /><!-- we can't overwrite an existing topic -->
  <input type="hidden" name="templatetopic" value="TemplateForReports" id="templatetopicSa" /><!-- sets the template that we are going to use -->
  <input type="hidden" name="topic" value="" id="topicForNewSa" />
    <input type="button" onClick="return makeTopicName('Sa');" value="Create" id="submitSa" />
    <!-- have to make the topic name before we can submit! -->
</form><!-- Close out the form -->
<!-- End of Sub-Area report -->


</noautolink>



<a name="PiQuarterly"></a>
<!-- the div for the PI report -->
<!-- div id="PiDiv" style="width:35%; padding:1em; border:3px solid rgb(0,0,250); margin-bottom:2em; background-color:rgb(200,200,200);" -->
<noautolink>


---+++ Create new PI Quarterly Report

  <form name="PiReport_form" action="%SCRIPTURLPATH{edit}%/%WEB%/" id="reportFormPi">
  <input type="hidden" name="ReportType" value="PI Quarterly" id="reportTypePi" />
  <p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Select PI area:</span> 
    <select name="Reporter" id="reporterPi">
       <option value="">Select...</option>
       <option value="Boston" onClick="setReportingPerson('Boston University', 'Pi');">Boston U.</option>
       <option value="Bnl" onClick="setReportingPerson('BNL', 'Pi');">BNL</option>
       <option value="CalTech" onClick="setReportingPerson('CalTech', 'Pi');">CalTech</option>
       <option value="UscIsi" onClick="setReportingPerson('USC-ISI', 'Pi');">USC - ISI</option>
       <option value="Columbia" onClick="setReportingPerson('Columbia University', 'Pi');">Columbia</option>
       <option value="Cornell" onClick="setReportingPerson('Cornell University', 'Pi');">Cornell</option>
       <option value="Fermilab" onClick="setReportingPerson('Fermilab', 'Pi');">Fermilab</option>
       <option value="Indiana" onClick="setReportingPerson('Indiana University', 'Pi');">Indiana</option>
       <option value="Lbnl" onClick="setReportingPerson('LBNL', 'Pi');">LBNL</option>
       <option value="Slac" onClick="setReportingPerson('SLAC', 'Pi');">SLAC</option>
       <option value="Ucsd" onClick="setReportingPerson('UCSD', 'Pi');">UCSD</option>
       <option value="ChicagoAnl" onClick="setReportingPerson('University of Chicago / Argonne National Laboratory', 'Pi');">Chicago/ANL</option>
       <option value="Florida" onClick="setReportingPerson('University of Florida', 'Pi');">Florida</option>
       <option value="Iowa" onClick="setReportingPerson('University of Iowa', 'Pi');">Iowa</option>
       <option value="UncRenci" onClick="setReportingPerson('RENCI', 'Pi');">UNC-RENCI</option>
       <option value="UWMadison" onClick="setReportingPerson('University of Wisconsin - Madison', 'Pi');">UW Madison</option>
     </select>
     <input type="hidden" name="reportingPerson" id="reportingPersonPi" value="" />
   </p>
  <p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Period of Report:</span>
    <select name="period" id="periodPi">
       <option value="">Select...</option>
       <option value="2007Q1">Q1 2007</option>
       <option value="2007Q2">Q2 2007</option>
       <option value="2007Q3">Q3 2007</option>
       <option value="2007Q4">Q4 2007</option>
     </select>
  </p>

  <!-- everything else is hidden -->
  <input type="hidden" name="topicparent" value="%TOPIC%" id="topicparentPi" /><!-- sets this topic as the parent for the report topic that we are creating -->
  <input type="hidden" name="onlywikiname" value="on" id="onlywikinamePi" />
  <input type="hidden" name="onlynewtopic" value="on" id="onlynewtopicPi" /><!-- we can't overwrite an existing topic -->
  <input type="hidden" name="templatetopic" value="TemplateForReports" id="templatetopicPi" /><!-- sets the template that we are going to use -->
  <input type="hidden" name="topic" value="" id="topicForNewPi" />
    <input type="button" onClick="return makeTopicName('Pi');" value="Create" id="submitPi" /><!-- have to make the topic name before we can submit! -->
</form>
<!-- end PI report form -->
<!-- End PI report -->
</noautolink>
